page.title: 10WATER SPORTS
page.content: { The Upper Deck swimming pool was {opened in 1936.} It is a heated open air pool and is equipped with "water slides". Many children from local schools use the pool and it usually opens for the season on the Spring Bank Holiday weekend. The entrance lies along the tow path on the River Thames near Molesey Lock. {The tow {path here is a very popular place for {walking}and viewing the events on the river. { There are several boatyards on the {river in this area}where those who can afford to can keep large pleasure boats. {Rowing and canoeing are {popular river sports}and there are several boat clubs on this stretch of the river. {In 1867 the first {Molesey Amateur Regatta was held}and this is now a popular annual event.
